content.query:
CREATE TABLE [Topic].[NATO_Topics]
( 
	[id] bigint  NULL,
	[created_at] DATETIME2(7)  NULL,
	[text] NVARCHAR(4000)  NULL,
	[lang] nvarchar(10)  NULL,
	[retweet_count] INT  NULL,
	[reply_count] INT  NULL,
	[like_count] INT  NULL,
	[quote_count] INT  NULL,
	[impression_count] INT  NULL,
	[cleantext] NVARCHAR(4000)  NULL,
    [topic_0_confidence] FLOAT NULL,
    [topic_1_confidence] FLOAT NULL,
    [topic_2_confidence] FLOAT NULL,
    [topic_3_confidence] FLOAT NULL,
    [topic_4_confidence] FLOAT NULL,
	[topic] BIGINT NULL
)

GO
